lines: ﻿At first his head sank down, then he began to swim.
The trees lining the banks looked askance, some thought him mad, others were alarmed at the sight. But Mango was unaware of them. He was lost in his own thoughts.
Mad Mango had embarked on his travels to seek a new life---to see new lands. This madness, this spirit of adventure would always be part of Mango.
